com.cyc.session

Interface CycSession

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface CycSession
extends Closeable
    An active (or potentially active) session with a Cyc server. Implementation is provided by a SessionFactory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CycSession.ConnectionStatus
      The connection status of a CycSession.
      static interface  CycSession.SessionListener
      Provides notifications about changes to a CycSession.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a CycSession.SessionListener to this session.
      void close()
      Closes a session, and releases it from the local thread.
      CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the CycSessionConfiguration used to configure this session.
      CycSession.ConnectionStatus getConnectionStatus()
      Returns the current status of the session's connection.
      static CycSession getCurrent()
      Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread.
      SessionOptions getOptions()
      Returns a set of modifiable options, including the name of the cyclist making assertions, and the project's KE purpose.
      CycServerInfo getServerInfo()
      Provides basic information about the state and location of the server to which the CycSession is connected (or was connected).
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether the CycSession is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrent

        static CycSession getCurrent()
                      throws SessionConfigurationException,
                             SessionCommunicationException,
                             SessionInitializationException
        Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread. This static method wraps a call to SessionManager.getCurrentSession(); see that method's documentation for more details.
        Returns:
        CycSession
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if the application is not sufficiently configured for the CycConfigurationManager to connect to a Cyc server.
        SessionCommunicationException - if the application encounters problems communicating with a Cyc server.
        SessionInitializationException - if the application encounters problems initializing the CycSession.

      • getConnectionStatus

        CycSession.ConnectionStatus getConnectionStatus()
        Returns the current status of the session's connection.
        Returns:
        the current SessionStatus

      • getOptions

        SessionOptions getOptions()
        Returns a set of modifiable options, including the name of the cyclist making assertions, and the project's KE purpose. The session's configuration may provide defaults for these options, or possibly prevent certain options from being changed.
        Returns:
        the current SessionOptions

      • getConfiguration

        CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns the CycSessionConfiguration used to configure this session. These settings cannot be modified.
        Returns:
        the original CycSessionConfiguration

      • getServerInfo

        CycServerInfo getServerInfo()
        Provides basic information about the state and location of the server to which the CycSession is connected (or was connected). If the CycSession has not been initialized (i.e., getStatus().equals(SessionStatus.UNINITIALIZED)) this method should return null.
        Returns:
        CycServerInfo for the session's server, or null if CycSession is uninitialized.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes a session, and releases it from the local thread. This method should always be called when you know that you are finished with a particular session.

        Note that this method will not necessarily close the underlying connection to the Cyc server; such details are handled by the SessionManager, which may allow resources to be shared between sessions. Calling this method informs the SessionManager that a particular session is closed, allowing the manager to make better decisions about resource management.

        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        See Also:
        Session API Connection Management

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether the CycSession is closed.
        Returns:
        whether CycSession is closed

      • addListener

        CycSession.SessionListener addListener(CycSession.SessionListener listener)
        Adds a CycSession.SessionListener to this session.
        Parameters:
        listener -
        Returns:
        the SessionListener which was added to the session
